entry.title: Tag Cloud and Background Noise
entry.content: I just installed a plugin to generate tag clouds (see the right sidebar) using this plugin here. I also finally discovered how to make background images that are just noises using this background generator here. I like the simplicity of these backgrounds!

entry.title: New Layout!
entry.content: I got a new octopress layout using Melandri's layout here. I also discovered how to make cool striped backgrounds with StripeGenerator, use cool new fonts from The League of Movable Type, and use cool pre-made icons with Double-J Design. Hopefully the layout will encourage me to actually keep up with my tech blog!
